title: Newly constructed spacious house for rent!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for September 2022!

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Whole Foods, and Sprouts are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Via Locusta, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Aleksandar, Alice Pizza, Marathon Grill, and Marathon on the Square. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a selection of scones at Metropolitan Bakery. Savor a scoop of ice cream from Van Leeuwen or Jeni's.
Community Features:
* Building on Rittenhouse Square
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with wifi
* 24/7 Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/yoga studio with exercise video library
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge desk staff
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more!
Apartment Home Features:
* Furnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor
* Oversized floor plan
* Large closets
* Wood floors
* Breakfast bar
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* East-facing windows with a city view
* All utilities included
Interested in this home? Then, your next step is to schedule an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com. You may take a guided tour in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Please note that the leasing office closed at 12:00 PM on Friday, September 2, 2022 and will reopen at 9:00 AM on Tuesday, September 6, 2022.
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: Huge 1st Floor Apt
description:
This apartment is perfect for those that want a quiet safe neighborhood while still being close to the activity and convenience of Philly. The house was built in 1910 so it has a lot of old-school charm you won't find elsewhere.
With just over 1200 sq ft of space, it comes with a full size living room, dining room, and kitchen. With 12' ceilings what was already quite sizeable feels even bigger. The bathroom is even freshly remodeled. It sits on a double lot so there is plenty of backyard for a furry friend to run around in. It is also conveniently located 2 blocks from the train into Center City and about 7 minutes north of the airport.
Amenities include:
Central AC
Off Street Parking
Washer/Dryer on Site
Gas Stove
High Speed Internet Included

title: Newly constructed spacious house for rent!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for September 2022!

The studio apartment home at 1407 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. This home on the 14th floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, and One Liberty Place. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 16, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, and The Dandelion. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, and Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a selection of scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the fabulous farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: 2964 N 23rd St...Beautiful TwO/*ranch house
description: Beautiful farmette with a 2 bedroom ranch house on 2964 N 23rd St. Extremely well cared for property, exudes pride of ownership! Bank barn has 3 floors, 9 stables, a garage area, new windows, electricity and lighting. In the past it has been used for raising livestock, with the pasture located behind the home. Most recently it has been used for storage of cars, boats, and tools. Property is zoned for Business Enterprise....could this be the new home of your business? The most adorable house has a custom made kitchen and bathroom cabinets, large eat in kitchen, 2 fireplaces...one in living room and one in family room downstairs. 3 large bedrooms, one being a walk thru. Closet and cabinets are aplenty, you won't run out of storage! Kitchen windows overlooks the gorgeous pond and garden. Downstairs you'll find a family room, another full bath, xtra large laundy and canning room, a shop area, and an outside stairway with a belco door. There is a whole house generator, Central Air, new gas boiler with 2 zones. 2 solar panels on roof are owned, not leased. If you have been searching for a property with multiple uses, a farmette, or just a great place to spread out....this is your new home. Please tracts of land on attached deed, totaling the texe me.

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Dishwasher, Gym
description:
The studio apartment home at 2111 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. This home on the 21st floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 10, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, and The Dandelion. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, and Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a selection of scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the fabulous farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge at the front desk
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Laundry room with a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 21st floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large windows that face south
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2111 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. Live virtual tours in Zoom available!
Please note that the leasing office closes at 12:00 PM on Friday, September 2, 2022 and will reopen on Tuesday, September 6, 2022 at 9:00 AM.
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 19 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!

title: Big Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home, Washer and Dryer
description:
The home at 1602 is a 1,180 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 16th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home as early as August 31, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, L'Occitane, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, Aleksandar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, The Continental Mid-town, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Joe's Pizza, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in ice cream from Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the farmer's market at Rittenhouse Square every Tuesday and Saturday form 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM! There is so much to do in this area!
Community Features:
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished two bedroom two bathroom apartment home on the 16th floor
* Combination washer and dryer
* Spacious closets
* Large east-facing windows
* City view
* Wood floors
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave drawer
* Beautiful bathrooms with Italian tile
* Spacious home at 1,180 square feet
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
To see if this home is still available for lease, go to our website to see if 1602 is still listed under the Da Vinci floor plan. Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. Live virtual tours in Zoom available!
